MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: this mapping is to create /update paramter file to execute stored procedure for get_avg_price_cost
MAPPING.NAME: m_FCST_PARAM_AVGPRICECOST

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: THIS EXPRESSION IS TO LOAD PARAMETER FILE
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_PARAM_LOAD

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: SOURCE QUALIFER TO FETCH PARAMETER FOR STORED PROCEDURE LOAD
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: SQ_FCST_PARAMETERS

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Sql Query
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: select min(decode(parameter_name,'fiscal_year',parameter_value_number)) as fiscal_year, min(decode(parameter_name,'fiscal_period',parameter_value_number)) as fiscal_period from HSF_BATCH.fcst_parameters where parameter_group_name='FCST_HISTORICAL_PRICE_COST'

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: THIS EXPRESSION IS TO LOAD PARAMETER FILE
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_PARAM_LOAD

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: SOURCE QUALIFER TO FETCH PARAMETER FOR STORED PROCEDURE LOAD
INSTANCE.NAME: SQ_FCST_PARAMETERS

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Maximum Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Maximum Percentage of Total Memory Allowed For Auto Memory Attributes
Additional Concurrent Pipelines for Lookup Cache Creation
Save session log for these runs
Session Log File Max Time Period

SESSION.DESCRIPTION: this session is to create paramter file to execute stored procedure for get_avg_price_cost
SESSION.NAME: s_m_PARAM_AVGPRICECOST

ATTRIBUTE.NAME: Write Backward Compatible Session Log File
Allow Pushdown for User Incompatible Connections

MAPPING.DESCRIPTION: This mapping is to load FCST_SBU_SG_INVTYCG_PRICE_COST from stored procedure
MAPPING.NAME: m_FCST_SBU_SG_INVTYCG

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: TIHS EXPRESSION IS TO PROVIDE VALUES FOR TARGET LOAD
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: EXP_LOAD

TRANSFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: THIS FILTER IS TO FILTER OUT ALL UNMAPPED, NULLS AND ZEROS
TRANSFORMATION.NAME: FILT_UNMAPPED_NULLS_ZEROS

TABLEATTRIBUTE.NAME: Filter Condition
TABLEATTRIBUTE.VALUE: UPPER(STYLEGROUP) != 'UNMAPPED' AND NOT ISNULL( VALUE) AND VALUE != 0

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: TIHS EXPRESSION IS TO PROVIDE VALUES FOR TARGET LOAD
INSTANCE.NAME: EXP_LOAD

INSTANCE.DESCRIPTION: THIS FILTER IS TO FILTER OUT ALL UNMAPPED, NULLS AND ZEROS
INSTANCE.NAME: FILT_UNMAPPED_NULLS_ZEROS
